mapper.select: SELECT AUTHOR_CODE, AUTHOR_NM, AUTHOR_DC, AUTHOR_CREAT_DE, USE_AT FROM COMTNAUTHORINFO WHERE AUTHOR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY AUTHOR_CREAT_DE DESC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO COMTNAUTHORINFO A USING db_root ON A.AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode} WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AUTHOR_NM = #{authorNm}, AUTHOR_DC = #{authorDc}, AUTHOR_CREAT_DE = SYSDATETIME, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{registerId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (AUTHOR_CODE, AUTHOR_NM, AUTHOR_DC, AUTHOR_CREAT_DE, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{authorCode}, #{authorNm}, #{authorDc}, SYSDATETIME, #{useAt}, SYSDATETIME, #{registerId}, SYSDATETIME, #{registerId})
